definition[0]: to discover the meaning of a message written in a code (=a set of secret signs or letters)
definition[1]: if a computer decodes data, it receives it and changes it into a form that can be used by the computer or understood by a person
example[0]: The software decodes the information embedded in the satellite broadcasts.
definition[2]: to receive electronic or digital signals and change them into a picture and sound for a television or radio
example[1]: decoding boxes for your TV set
definition[3]: to understand the meaning of a word
